document.full_text: derrick rose scored 23 points in chicago's seventh straight win, a 98-79 victory over washington that moved the bulls into sole possession of first place in the eastern conference.
document.title: bulls win 7th straight, are alone atop east race
lines_and_colors: derrick rose scored 23 points in chicago's seventh straight win, a 98-79 victory over washington that moved the bulls into sole possession of first place in the eastern conference.
